# Mairghandis

It is not known where or what Mairghandis is but tales and legends travel all across Kandalur speaking of the evils born there. Is it a city? Is it a kingdom? Is it something else?

![Mairghandis](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5a63aaed-8bd9-4c3e-8b9c-00e49f3aa2ad/d6m4epq-0cf904e0-b81e-4b34-a5ef-34b2a52ab98f.jpg/v1/fill/w_1024,h_475,q_75,strp/aegik_6_tile__evil_fortress__by_tyleredlinart_d6m4epq-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..w0Yt4vvuOd-wHRUQ3SQFalBBCKA_QWl6P92ZA3GZctw)
